attributes.action: prevent the drivers of emergency response vehicles from receiving notices of intended prosecution when driving above the speed limit to attend emergency calls.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The requirement of emergency response vehicle drivers to defend themselves against prosecution results in wasted time and the threat of prosecution has resulted in personnel reducing their speed - at times not going above the speed limit, which may have life threatening consequences in emergency situations.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to prevent the drivers of emergency response vehicles from receiving notices of intended prosecution when driving above the speed limit to attend emergency calls.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=ambulancespeed


Her Majesty's Government
